about_the_game:
The Last Order Dungeons is a classic piexelarta arcade game with addictive gameplay that involves fighting hostile forces that want to take over the world. Each duel is different by procedurally generated enemies, making each approach to the game will be different.

While fighting enemies you gain experience, which increases the number of lives of your hero and shortens the cooldown of special spells. As you level up, you will unlock new unique skins for your heroes. In the game you will find a mass of unique dungeons differing in style as well as difficulty level.

Overview


There are two game modes available in the game:

  • Campaign, consisting of 12 dungeons of 5 levels each.
  • Freeplay, where you fight an infinite number of enemies.
  • Challenges, where we have to defeat a certain number of enemies using only basic attacks.
  • Training, where you can practice on your skills.
  • Fast Game, where you can play at any time to beat your records.

The Last Order Dungeon is:

  • Addictive gameplay
  • Classic retro 1-bit style
  • Unlocking new skins
  • Leveling up characters
  • Exploring dungeons
  • Amazing 8-bit music

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista
  • Processor: Intel Atom N2100 1.6GHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
  • Sound Card: HD Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570 3.40Ghz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7650A
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
  • Sound Card: HD Audio

short_description: The world is headed for destruction. Olvelia and Olvelius (members of the last order) need your help. Only the three of you can prevent the coming catastrophe and change the fate of the world.
